parallel.distributed

Class PDBatchTaskExecutor.PDBTEThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutor.PDBTEThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    PDBatchTaskExecutor

    static class PDBatchTaskExecutor.PDBTEThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    auxiliary class for PDBatchTaskExecutor, implementing the threads in the executor's thread-pool. Not part of the public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2020

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        waits for TaskObject objects to execute from the related "PDBatchTaskExecutor$id$ message-passing queue, executes them, and sends the same task object on the "back-channel" as acknowledgement of execution. If it encounters a PoissonPill object, the method returns; if it encounters a SleepingPill object, the method sets the _sleeping field, and enters the waiting state until the outer-object shutDown() method, wakes the thread up again so as to kill it!.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
